# Types of HPLC {#sec-types .unnumbered}

*Separation Modes and Elution Techniques*
 
HPLC is like a Swiss Army knife: it has different “modes” to tackle unique separation challenges. This chapter explains the four main separation strategies and how to decide between **gradient** and **isocratic** elution. We’ll use real-world examples to show when and why each method shines.
